title: Lassoed in Texas Trilogy
description: Bask in laughs and tears as you visit Mosqueros, Texas, a Wild West town in the making, where you'll meet three matchless couples and a passel of children who begin their relationships on rough footing.Petticoat RanchSophie Edwards is doing jut fine alone, until a man walks into her life, insisting on rescuing her and her four daughters. can she find a way to love this headstrong stranger? Clay McClellan faces intense danger as he tangles with five independent frontier women. Can he keep them alive long enough to win their hearts?Calico CanyonSchoolmarm Grace Calhoun thought it was tough trying to teach the five Reeves boys. Now that she's suddenly their—egad!—stepmother, things are looking even bleaker. Can Grave tame these malicious monsters and win the heart of their reserved father before a relentless predator tracks her down?Gingham MountainHannah Cartwright is determined to keep Grant from committing two orphans to hard labor on his ranch. How far will she go to ensure their welfare? Grant is inexplicably drawn to Hannah. Will he win her love or be caught in the clutches of a scheming seamstress?These three romances are full of Mary Connealy's trademark humor and bound in a collection to be enjoyed again and again.
author: Mary Connealy
